books.title: The Dead Secret
books.author: Wilkie Collins
books.summary: A maidservant is forced by her dying mistress to conceal a deep family secret, at great personal cost to herself.

books.title: The Square Emerald
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: Scotland Yard’s first female investigator sets out to prove the innocence of a convicted forger.

books.title: The Diary
books.author: Samuel Pepys
books.summary: The diary of a man living in London in the 17th century.

books.title: The Lives and Opinions of Eminent Philosophers
books.author: Diogenes Laërtius
books.summary: Brief biographies of the prominent philosophers of ancient Greece.

books.title: Ozma of Oz
books.author: L. Frank Baum
books.summary: A girl gets whisked away to a fairy land and helps restore the proper rulers to the throne.

books.title: Indiscretions of Archie
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: When Englishman Archie Moffam makes a complaint about his room to the owner of the New York hotel, his life is changed forever.

books.title: Henry VI, Part I
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: King Henry VI takes the throne during a time of great political division: the quarreling among English noblemen and the collapse of England’s hold in France.

books.title: The Charwoman’s Shadow
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A young nobleman becomes a magician to secure his sister’s marriage.

books.title: Tracks in the Snow
books.author: Godfrey R. Benson
books.summary: A rector investigates the mystery behind a strange letter that may be connected to his friend’s murder.

books.title: The House on the Borderland
books.author: William Hope Hodgson
books.summary: An account of the terrifying metaphysical haunting of a recluse’s secluded home.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.

books.title: The Secret of Father Brown
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: The fourth set of stories of a Catholic priest who is also an amateur detective.

books.title: The Federalist Papers
books.author: Alexander Hamilton
books.summary: Eighty-five articles written by a group of U.S. Founding Fathers on why the proposed U.S. Constitution should be approved.

books.title: Pragmatism
books.author: William James
books.summary: James introduces the philosophy of pragmatism and applies it to some metaphysical problems.

books.title: Paradise Lost
books.author: John Milton
books.summary: A dramatic imagining in blank verse of the rebellion of Satan against God, Satan’s overthrow, and the Fall of Man.

books.title: Sartor Resartus
books.author: Thomas Carlyle
books.summary: The meta-fictional commentary on the life of “famous” German philosopher Diogenes Teufelsdröckh and his Philosophy of Clothes.

books.title: Looking Backward
books.author: Edward Bellamy
books.summary: A man falls asleep in 1887 and wakes up over a century later in a socialist utopia.

books.title: The Law of the Four Just Men
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: A group of wealthy vigilantes continue their quest to bring justice to those criminals beyond the reach of conventional law.

books.title: Religion and the Rise of Capitalism
books.author: R. H. Tawney
books.summary: A tracing of the development of religious thought from the Middle Ages to the dawn of the Industrial Revolution.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.
